statements: DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE category = 'Expense' AND transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE id = 10 AND category = 'Income';
DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries' AND date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM Income WHERE ID = 100 AND Date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE total_income > 50000 AND total_savings < 20000;
DELETE FROM income WHERE amount < 1000 AND source = 'Salary';
